Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.travelplanner.controller.UserController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserController extends Object
Controller for handling user-related requests such as trip creation, modification, and deletion.

  • Method Details

    • showCreateForm

      @GetMapping("/createTrip") public String showCreateForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form for creating a new trip.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      the name of the view to create a trip (createTrip.html).

    • createTripPlan

      @PostMapping("/createTrip") public String createTripPlan(@Valid @ModelAttribute("tripPlan") @Valid TriPlan triPlan, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Handles the submission of the trip creation form.
      Parameters:
      triPlan - the trip plan to create.
      bindingResult - the result of validation.
      authentication - the authentication object containing the user's details.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the trip list on success or the create trip view on failure.

    • showMyTrips

      @GetMapping("/myTrips") public String showMyTrips(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Displays the trips created by the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass data to the view.
      authentication - the authentication object containing the user's details.
      Returns:
      the name of the view to display the user's trips (myTrips.html).

    • deleteTrip

      @GetMapping("/deleteTrip/{tripId}") public String deleteTrip(@PathVariable Long tripId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Deletes a trip created by the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to delete.
      authentication - the authentication object containing the user's details.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the user's trips.

    • showAddDetailsForm

      @GetMapping("/addDetails/{tripId}") public String showAddDetailsForm(@PathVariable Long tripId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form to add details to a specific trip.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to add details to.
      model - the model to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      the name of the view to add details to the trip (addDetails.html).

    • handleDateSelection

      @PostMapping("/addDetails/{tripId}") public String handleDateSelection(@PathVariable Long tripId, @RequestParam("selectedDate") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE) LocalDate selectedDate)
      Handles the date selection in the add details form.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to add details to.
      selectedDate - the selected date to add details for.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the detailed form for the selected date.

    • showDetailedForm

      @GetMapping("/addDetails/{tripId}/{date}") public String showDetailedForm(@PathVariable Long tripId, @PathVariable @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE) LocalDate date, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the detailed form to add details for a specific date in a trip.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to add details to.
      date - the selected date to add details for.
      model - the model to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      the name of the view to add details for the selected date (addDetailsDate.html).

    • publishTrip

      @GetMapping("/publishTrip/{tripId}") public String publishTrip(@PathVariable Long tripId)
      Publishes a trip to make it publicly available.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to publish.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the user's trips.

    • unpublishTrip

      @GetMapping("/unpublishTrip/{tripId}") public String unpublishTrip(@PathVariable Long tripId)
      Unpublishes a trip to make it private.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to unpublish.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the user's trips.

    • saveDetailsForDate

      @PostMapping("/addDetails/{tripId}/{date}") public String saveDetailsForDate(@PathVariable Long tripId, @PathVariable @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE) LocalDate date, @RequestParam String hotel, @RequestParam String activity)
      Saves the details for a specific date in a trip.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to add details to.
      date - the selected date to add details for.
      hotel - the hotel to save for the selected date.
      activity - the activity to save for the selected date.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the user's trips.

    • showTripDetails

      @GetMapping("/presentDetails/{tripId}") public String showTripDetails(@PathVariable Long tripId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the details of a specific trip.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to display details for.
      model - the model to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      the name of the view to display the trip details (presentDetails.html).

    • error

      @GetMapping("/error") public String error()
      Returns the error.html page in case of an exception.
      Returns:
      the name of the view to display the error page.
